name: FRUIT
description: So far the best thing of all has been eating lots of fresh fruit!
myTake: As I'm writing this, I have my mat on the back of my chair and I am leaning on it without a shirt on. The pokey points on are pressing into my skin just not quite enough to hurt, but enough to trigger my bodies endorphin response. That is how accupressure works! It pokes you enough to release endorphins but not enough to be too uncomfortable. This mat is very versitile. You can put clothing in between you and the points if the pressure is too much. I like to stand on it in bare feet while I do things like brush my teeth. I often will put my legs across it when laying in bed. I can say this is one of my favorite purchases of the last year. It really does help me to feel less pain.

name: Neotech Care Back Brace
description: Neotech Care Back Brace - Lumbar Support - Back Support Belt - Wide, Adjustable & Breathable - Small Size
myTake: If you are prone to muscle tightness like I am, including lower back pain, this item can be a huge help. When I get even the slightest lower back pain, I do two things: stretch my hamstrings, and put on this brace. Even though my fibro pain happens mostly in my legs, being able to reduce back pain when it arises has helped improve my quality of life without a doubt. This particular model works very well. It fits comfortable and is made to last.

name: Memory Foam Mattress Topper
description: 2 Inches of 100% Real Visco Elastic Foam | 3 lb density for High Support and High Response | Made in USA | CertiPUR-US Certified, Queen
myTake: I good mattress is key for anyone suffering from fibromyalgia or chronic pain. I was just reading Game of Thrones and there is a line describing the character Brienne, as she wakes up 'her legs stiff as wood from sleeping on the hard ground.' Well, no matter how great my mattress is, I might end up waking up feeling like Brienne. But it's a lot worse on bad mattress. Equally important to a good mattress, for me, is a memory foam topper. It releaves pressure from gravity by dispersing it and molding to your shape. Also, for folks that would have a hard time affording a good mattress right now, adding a nice thick topper can be a huge step in the right direction.

name: Nutiva Organic Hemp Protein
description: 16 oz. Sustainably Grown Canadian Hempseed, â€“Cold-Processed Seed from Non GMO (50% Protein). Organic Hemp Protein
myTake: As someone with a sensitive stomach, getting all of my macronutrients can be challenging. For me the most challenging is getting enough protein. The world is full of protein powders. Most of them destroy my digestion! Whey based especially. When I found hemp protein powder, it improved my life considerably. It is really easy to digest, in fact it feels great in my body. It even tastes relatively good! It also packs a considerable ammount of fiber, and an amazing amount of vitimins and micro-nutrients to boot! I eat a smoothie with a scoop of hemp protein every day, and I probably will for the rest of my life. This brand is great, although there are a few other brands which are just as good. Just look for any that includes only one ingredient: hemp.

name: Skechers
description: Skechers air cooled memory foam, Sport Women's Burst Fashion Sneaker
myTake: Comfy shoes are a must for anyone suffering from chronic pain! I have found Skechers brand to be the most consistently comfortable! This is just one model, but look for any of their shoes that have a memory foam insole, and are light-weight mesh. I'm wearing my pair of slip on On The Go Skechers, and I love them.

name: Lion's Mane Mushroom Extract
description: Host Defense - Lion's Mane Mushroom Extract, Natural Support for Mental Clarity, Focus, Memory, Cerebral and Nervous System Health, Non-GMO, Vegan, Organic, 60 Serving (2 Ounces)
myTake: I've been taking Lions Mane for about 6 months (as of this writing) and it is amazing. I have felt a small but noticable increase in ability to focus, a decrease in anxiety, and best of all, a significant decrease in brain fog! I hesititate to say it cured my brain fog, but I would go as far as to say that Lion's Mane has played a huge role in making brain fog a rarity, where it used to be a normal part of every week. There are several brands out there, and many might be good, but Host Defence is owned by Paul Stamets, the godfather of mushrooms as medicine. I have personally used this brand to great effect, and it makes me happy to promote a product made by one of the true pioneers of this kind of medicine.

name: Hymalain Pink Salt Rock Lamps
description: Hymalain Pink Salt Rock Lamps(11-15 lbs,8.5-11" Height) with Genuine Rubber Wood Base, Touch Dimmer Switch, 3 X 15 Watt Bulbs,UL Cord & Gift Box
myTake: It's been shown that these beautiful lamps can pull dust and allergens out of the air. They also produce negatively charged ions, but as far as I can tell the jury is still out on if they produce enought to have a benefit. There is speculation that they can relieve headaches, stress, and do other fabulous things too! But one thing is absolutely certain, they are beautiful and create a calm, tranquil atmosphere. When our bodies themselves are sometimes very unpleasant places to be in, I believe it is even more important for people with chronic pain to make their homes as comfortable and pleasant as possible. These lamps do a lot towards that end! I certainly love mine!

name: Multispecies Probiotic Supplement
description: Klaire Labs Ther-Biotic Complete, 60 Vegetarian Capsules
myTake: When I did a gut health test through uBiome, my results came back, and I was very low on several healthy gut bacteria. Taking probiotics as a supplement can be an excellent way to introduce more healthy bacteria into the gut. Ideally, we will rebuild our own gut flora with a diet of mostly fruit! But in the mean time this can help a lot. I've used this brand, and my gut health has improved since I started taking it.

name: Klaire Labs Biotagen Powder Prebiotic Support
description: A versatile prebiotic formula to optimize gut microbiota and support bowel and immune system function.
myTake: Prebiotic's feed the good bacteria in our guts. I started taking this one and definitely felt that it has helped. But there are many good one's out there. These days I take Agave based inulin, because its very inexpensive in Mexico, but this is the brand that was recommended to me by my nutritionist.

name: Slippery Elm Bark Powder
description: U.S Grown Organic Slippery Elm Bark Powder, 1 Pound, Powerfully Soothes the Throat and Reduces Coughing. Non-Irradiated, Non-Contaminated, Non-GMO
myTake: Slippery Elm has been used for hundreds, if not thousands of years for throat and gut health. It coats the lining of your stomach to protect it, which is great when we have fibro flare ups that could be triggered from food. I keep these on hand to take anytime I start feeling a flare. They also work great for both diarrhea AND constipation!

name: Black Chia Seeds
description: 365 Everyday Value, Organic Black Chia Seed, 15 Ounce
myTake: Chia Seeds have been a crucial addition to my diet. I eat two table spoons a day in a smoothie, after soaking them a few minutes to soften them up. They do more than any other food to keep me regular, and they are inexpensive, which is great.

name: Raw Cacao Powder
description: Viva Naturals #1 Best Selling Certified Organic Cacao Powder from Superior Criollo Beans, 1 LB Bag
myTake: Full of magnesium, potassium, and iron, this super food tastes great, and packs a punch of vital nutrition. Besides, it flippin' delicious.

name: Ear Plugs
description: DownBeats Reusable High Fidelity Hearing Protection: Ear Plugs for Concerts, Music, and Musicians (Clear Ear Plugs, Blue Case)
myTake: Not everyone gets this, but sometimes my ears become very sensitive to noise. Once it was so bad, I was nearly in tears on the train ride home from work! Needless to say a good pair of ear plugs helped that tremendously. This brand works great, and comes with a handy keychain.

name: Nayoya Accupressure Mat
description: Nayoya Back and Neck Pain Relief - Acupressure Mat and Pillow Set - Relieves Stress, Back, Neck, and Sciatic Pain - Comes with a Vinyl Carry Bag for Storage and Travel - As Seen in USA Today
myTake: As I'm writing this, I have my mat on the back of my chair and I am leaning on it without a shirt on. The pokey points on are pressing into my skin just not quite enough to hurt, but enough to trigger my bodies endorphin response. That is how accupressure works! It pokes you enough to release endorphins but not enough to be too uncomfortable. This mat is very versitile. You can put clothing in between you and the points if the pressure is too much. I like to stand on it in bare feet while I do things like brush my teeth. I often will put my legs across it when laying in bed. I can say this is one of my favorite purchases of the last year. It really does help me to feel less pain.
